action.action-desc: Mr. Sanders (for himself and Mr. Blumenthal) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 36, United States Code, to improve the Federal charter for the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States, and for other purposes.

section.header: Improvements to Federal charter of Veterans of Foreign Wars

subsection.text: Section 230101(a) of title 36, United States Code, is amended by striking men and inserting veterans.
Section 230102(3) of such title is amended by striking widows and inserting surviving spouses.
